section.title: Xlib Compose Keys for pt_PT.UTF-8
section.para: Applications using Xlib input handling should recognize these compose key sequences in locales using the pt_PT.UTF-8 compose table.

This compose table includes the non-conflicting entries from: /data/data/com.lfgit/files/usr/share/X11/locale/en_US.UTF-8/Compose. Those entries are not shown here - see those charts for the included key sequences.

row.entry: "ร" Ccedilla # LATIN CAPITAL LETTER C WITH CEDILLA
"รง" ccedilla # LATIN SMALL LETTER C WITH CEDILLA
